thread.title: Netflix for Android just got a new feature iPhone owners will never see
thread.title_full: Netflix for Android just got a new feature iPhone owners will never see

author: Chris Smith
title: Netflix for Android just got a new feature iPhone owners will never see
text:
Netflix for Android has just gotten a lot better thanks to one simple feature addition. And this particular new feature marks a rare occasion, because it's nowhere to be found in the iPhone version of Netflix's app. In fact, this is the type of feature the iPhone will surely never get. 
Continue reading...
